text: Ahhh, Wyndia, home of the Wing Clan and recurring kingdom in the Breath of Fire series. Breath of Fire IV's style was quite a departure from the previous games, so it actually felt good to see that Wyndia was still present. The first few notes of this theme were enough for me to feel right at home, ready to explore the town.
author: SupraDarky

text: Yess! Bof4 is my favorite in the series and along with final fantasy 6 and xenogears are my favorite Sprite based games! Chrono trigger is good but i think it lacks something. Bof4 had such a good storyline with fou - lou and Ryu
